title: Did one of the drunken sailors use the raccoon to bypass the ignition input?
subtitle: A funny viral police report alleged that a drunken Navy officer used a raccoon to bypass an interlocking ignition system installed in his car.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: An officer of the Navy was arrested for "abuse of public animals" and "intellectual or reckless driving" after he used a raccoon to bypass the interlocking ignition system.
